definition: an old or over-worked horse, to remind or urge constantly
details:
noun
- an old or over-worked horse
= example: an old or over-worked horse
= synonyms: jade
- someone who annoys people by constantly finding fault
= example: someone who annoys people by constantly finding fault
= synonyms: scold, scolder, nagger, common scold
verb
- to remind or urge constantly
= example: to remind or urge constantly
- to bother persistently with trivial complaints
= example: to bother persistently with trivial complaints
= synonyms: peck, hen-peck
- to worry persistently
= example: to worry persistently
